snippet: After a power loss upended commutes for tens of thousands of riders, the New Haven line plans to return to normal operations in time for the Monday morning rush, transit officials said.
abstract: Metro-North Railroad is expected to return New Haven line to full service October 7, nearly two weeks after Con Edison power failure in Mount Vernon, NY, upended commutes for tens of thousands of travelers across Northeast.
lead_paragraph: After a power loss upended commutes for tens of thousands of riders, the New Haven line plans to return to normal operations in time for the Monday morning rush, transit officials said.

headline.main: Metro-North to Resume Full Service on Monday
headline.print_headline: Metro-North Set to Resume Full Service
